sentence.Network_en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentence.Network_cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentence.Network_en: He was put into a trance by a police hypnotist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在一位警方催眠师的引导下进入了催眠状态。

sentence.Network_en: A hypnotist can act upon the unconscious mind directly.
sentence.Network_cn: 催眠师能直接作用于无意识思维。

PerfectNetExp.abs: - 催眠师(Hypnotist)与催眠治疗师(Hypnotherapist)有否不同？根据美国催眠治疗大师Hunter认为，数天的所谓催眠治疗课程的毕业生， …

list.abs: In the end I went to a hypnotist ., 到最后我去找了一位催眠师.
下面的惊人事例，并非靠药物或祷告达成。祷告的力量又是另一个主题，我们会另辟专章讨论。让我们先从“舞台催眠师”（stage hypnotist）开始。大多数的人都看过催眠表演。基本上，催眠师的手法，就是在潜意识植入建议，并带来叹为观止的结果。
She needs to bring a photo to the hypnotist but isn ' t having much luck ., 她需要把照片给催眠师 , 但这没有太大帮助.
A hypnotist looks for subjects are easily entranced., 催眠师专找一些易受催眠的人为对象.

entry.def: Hypnotism is the practice of hypnotizing people.

example.ex: Dulcy also saw a psychiatrist who used hypnotism to help her deal with her fear.
example.tran: 达尔茜还看过一位精神科医生，他使用催眠术帮她消除恐惧。

sentences.en: According to one estimate, about19 in20 people can be hypnotizd to some degree if they want to be and if they trust the hypnotist.
sentences.cn: 据估计，20个人中有19个人可程度不同地被催眠，如果他们想被催眠并相信催眠的人。
